[scenario]
clients=client10026;client10027
import=end-of-header.txt
actions=large-body;post-large-body

[client10026]
port=10026

[client10027]
port=10027

[large-body]
command=body



response=body
n_received=1
status=continue

;;

[post-large-body]
command=body

chunk=0

response=body

status=continue

chunks=0;;
